title: Calories in Pink Lady Apples
meta_description: Learn calories in pink lady apples per medium fruit, including carbs, fiber, sugars, protein, fat, and quick variations for your diet.
assumptions: Medium size (182 g), raw with skin, fresh, no added sugars or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by apple size, ripeness, growing conditions, and storage; values are averages. Check produce labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: One medium Pink Lady apple provides ~95 kcal, 4.4 g fiber, and natural sweetness from 19 g sugars.

label_note: Values align with Nutrition Facts labels for straightforward comparison to packaged foods.

faqs.q: How many calories in one pink lady apple?
faqs.a: About 95 kcal for a medium (182 g) raw Pink Lady apple with skin.

faqs.q: Are pink lady apples low carb?
faqs.a: Yes, one medium apple has 25 g carbs, mostly from natural sugars and fiber.

faqs.q: What's the fiber content in pink lady apples?
faqs.a: Around 4.4 g per medium apple, aiding digestion and satiety.

faqs.q: Do pink lady apples have fat or cholesterol?
faqs.a: Negligible fat (0.3 g) and zero cholesterol per apple.

faqs.q: How do pink lady apples compare to other varieties calorie-wise?
faqs.a: Similar to Gala or Fuji; all average 52 kcal per 100 g, varying slightly by size.
